pullRequest.title: Download paella source code from github instead of using npm + paella update to 6.4.3
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR changes the way opencast downloads the paella source from npm to download the tar from github.
The problem with npm is that the package-lock.json file is not fetched and during build other versions can be used that can cause problems (see #1131, polimediaupv/paella#534)

@miesgre  This pull pushes the version of JQuery, and other dependencies, back for people who have already built on this version of Paella. I recommend making this pull part part of the next Paella upgrade. Then the dependencies are as current, or more current, then the  current version of the adopter's Paella dependencies.
